annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows for the end of today's match.
Sassuolo are ruled offside.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Kevin Strootman (AS Roma) is booked by the referee.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Today's referee Marco Di Bello rightly decides to book Federico Peluso (Sassuolo) for his harsh tackle.
The linesman raises his flag. Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) is adjudged offside.
Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) unleashes a powerful shot towards goal, but it is bravely blocked by a self sacrificing defender.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 4 additional min. will be played.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Daniele De Rossi (AS Roma) will take a corner kick.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Daniele De Rossi (AS Roma) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Leandro Paredes.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) decides to take a short corner instead of crossing into the box.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) looks like he will be the one to try and deliver a quality ball into the penalty box from the corner kick.
Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) attempts to surprise the keeper with a nice shot, but it lacks more accuracy and goes way wide of the left post.
Dangerous play by Leandro Paredes (AS Roma). Marco Di Bello blows his whistle for a foul.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The manager makes a subsitution with Diego Perotti (AS Roma) coming on for Mohamed Salah.
Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) reacts well near the penalty spot to connect with the resulting corner, but fails to direct his header into the back of the net. The ball floats high over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) is about to take a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) will deliver the ball into the penalty box from a corner kick.
Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) came close to scoring but should have done much better. His poor attempt from close range ended up in the gloves of Andrea Consigli.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals a substitution. Federico Ricci (Sassuolo) is brought on as a substitute for Simone Missiroli.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) receives the ball inside the box, reacts quickly and without any problems fires the ball into the back of the net.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The referee awards a corner and Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) goes over to take it.
Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) wins himself enough space to meet the resulting corner on the edge of the box and fires the ball at goal, but the keeper does well to stop his effort.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) prepares to take a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) is heading toward the corner flag to take the set piece.
Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) connects with the corner kick around the penalty spot, but steers his header inches over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) will take the corner.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Bruno Peres walks off the pitch and Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) comes on as a substitute.
Kevin Strootman (AS Roma) shoots from the edge of the penalty area. The ball travels low towards the middle of the target, but Andrea Consigli easily deals with the threat.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Lorenzo Pellegrini (Sassuolo) looks like he will be the one to take the corner kick.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Gregoire Defrel is being substituted because of an injury. Eusebio Di Francesco sends Alessandro Matri (Sassuolo) on the pitch.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Gregoire Defrel (Sassuolo) is asking for medical treatment, but he will have to leave the pitch in order to receive help from the physio.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will send the ball into the penalty box.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Sassuolo take a short corner kick.
Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) trips an opposition player and Marco Di Bello signals a foul.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Eusebio Di Francesco has decided to make a substitution during the half time break. Pol Lirola (Sassuolo) comes on the pitch for Timo Letschert.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half has just started.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Marco Di Bello has ended it.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Mohamed Salah (AS Roma) was in the right place at the right time to pounce on the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball home. It's 2:1.
Stephan El Shaarawy (AS Roma) came close to scoring but should have done much better. His poor attempt from close range ended up in the gloves of Andrea Consigli.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: There's an opportunity for Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) to deliver the ball into the box from a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will swing the ball into the penalty box.

Matteo Politano (Sassuolo) shoots from the edge of the penalty area. The ball travels towards the crossbar, but Wojciech Szczesny easily deals with the threat. Sassuolo force a corner. They send men into the box.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 3 min. of added time.
Antonio Rudiger (AS Roma) rises high to meet a perfect cross, but powers his header just wide of the left post.
Poor challenge! Matteo Politano (Sassuolo) is penalised for tripping and Marco Di Bello blows his whistle.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) takes a short corner kick.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Timo Letschert (Sassuolo) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Marco Di Bello didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
Lorenzo Pellegrini (Sassuolo) seems to have picked up a minor injury, but it looks like he will be able to continue playing.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Lorenzo Pellegrini (Sassuolo) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.
AS Roma are ruled offside.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Sassuolo quickly take a corner kick with a short pass.
Konstantinos Manolas (AS Roma) has picked up a minor injury, but it looks like he will be able to continue.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: The game is interrupted now, Konstantinos Manolas (AS Roma) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.
One of the players from Sassuolo times his run too early and the referee blows his whistle for offside.
Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) is able to continue to play.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) is writhing in pain and can now receive medical treatment after the referee signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.

Matteo Politano (Sassuolo) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a low strike towards the middle of the goal. Wojciech Szczesny guesses his intention and denies him with a fine save.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) scores an incredible goal! He receives a pass, makes some space for himself and unleashes a long range thunderbolt of a shot past the goalkeeper into the bottom left corner.
Stephan El Shaarawy (AS Roma) finds himself beyond the last defender, but the game is stopped by the referee after the linesman signals for offside.
The linesman raises his flag as one of the players from Sassuolo was in an offside position.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Sassuolo work the corner short. The ball is passed to a nearby teammate.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: After receiving a sweet pass, Gregoire Defrel (Sassuolo) unleashes a shot straight into the top left corner. Good team effort!
Marco Di Bello couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Radja Nainggolan (AS Roma) and blew his whistle.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) will try to find the head of one of his teammates from a corner kick.
What a big chance! Gregoire Defrel (Sassuolo) picks up an inch perfect pass inside the box and skies the ball well over the bar.
Mohamed Salah (AS Roma) produces a good strike that sails towards the left post, but the goalkeeper shows great reflexes and dives to keep the effort from hitting the net.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has just started.
Sassuolo will kick off.
Let us introduce today's referee to you, and it's Marco Di Bello.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: The starting lineups of both teams are already revealed and you can check them out in the details of this match.
Hello and welcome to our minute by minute commentary of the upcoming clash. We will try to provide you with as accurate as possible picture of the happenings on the pitch. Have fun.
Sassuolo are now without a win in their last 3 games.
AS Roma have gone 17 consecutive matches without a draw.

annotations.description: The referee blows for the end of today's match.
